mapper.select: SELECT A.tb_product_no as tb_product_no, B.tb_product_no as pdseq, A.tb_product_sub_title as tb_product_sub_title, B.tb_product_name as tb_product_name, A.tb_product_sub_no as tb_product_sub_no FROM `tb_product_sub` AS A INNER JOIN `tb_product` AS B WHERE A.tb_product_no = B.tb_product_no
